section.title: bank reconciliations summarized history of Summarized Bank Reconciliation History
section.para: To view summarized Bank Reconciliation history, select the "Summarized Bank Reconciliation History" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying summarized Bank Reconciliation history, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account whose summarized Bank Reconciliation History you want to view.
Display will summarize past Bank Reconciliations for the specified Bank Account.
